content: the story i wanted to make a bandana and i thought this would be a cute little thing to whip up for spring and summer markets while the stitches are a bit more advanced they re easy to do once you get into the swing of things i hope you enjoy it things you ll need 150 yards of worsted weight yarn 5mm/h crochet hook yarn needle scissors stitch markers stitches and techniques to know chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet single_crochet - single_crochet skip st - skip stitch half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet in the third loop - work into the back third loop of a half_double_crochet in the front loop flo - work into the front loop of a half_double_crochet from the row before fpdc - front post double_crochet bpdc - back post double_crochet ex-puff - extended puff yarn over pull up a loop yarn over pull up a loop yarn over pull up a loop pull through all but the last two loops on your hook yarn over and pull through the two loops see tips and tricks section for a video chainless double_crochet - see tips and tricks section for a video
